name: UpSus
description:
5 levels where you try to get at the top.  DON'T touch the green, it's not a "save the world" game. 

Control should be pretty easy, arrows or A and D to move, space to jump. There is a catch, you can jump only if you touch the white alies. While you are touching them, you can hold space to slow things down, get a little bit of perspective.
